verses.text: 1 "JESUS_END"Paul, and Silvanus, and Timotheus, unto the church of the Thessalonians which is in God the Father and in the Lord Jesus Christ: Grace be unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-1-2/" title="1 Thessalonians 1:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2  "JESUS_END"We give thanks to God always for you all, making mention of you in our prayers;

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-1-3/" title="1 Thessalonians 1:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3  "JESUS_END"Remembering without ceasing your work of faith, and labour of love, and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ, in the sight of God and our Father;
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-1-4/" title="1 Thessalonians 1:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4  "JESUS_END"Knowing, brethren beloved, your election of God.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-1-5/" title="1 Thessalonians 1:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5  "JESUS_END"For our gospel came not unto you in word only, but also in power, and in the Holy Ghost, and in much assurance; as ye know what manner of men we were among you for your sake.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-1-6/" title="1 Thessalonians 1:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6  "JESUS_END"And ye became followers of us, and of the Lord, having received the word in much affliction, with joy of the Holy Ghost:
<a href="../1-Thessalonians-1-7/" title="1 Thessalonians 1:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7  "JESUS_END"So that ye were ensamples to all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-1-8/" title="1 Thessalonians 1:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8  "JESUS_END"For from you sounded out the word of the Lord not only in Macedonia and Achaia, but also in every place your faith to God-ward is spread abroad; so that we need not to speak any thing.

<a href="../1-Thessalonians-1-9/" title="1 Thessalonians 1:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9  "JESUS_END"For they themselves shew of us what manner of entering in we had unto you, and how ye turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God;
10 "JESUS_END"And to wait for his Son from heaven, whom he raised from the dead, even Jesus, which delivered us from the wrath to come.
